full_text:
a  Saúde Pública e cmeteu também,contra segurança ao incentivar o Uso de medicamentos INÚTEIS comprovado cientificamente mesmo Hidroxicliroquna e sabendo de inuteis solicitou ao Exército milhões de

public health is also committed against security by encouraging the use of useless drugs scientifically proven, even hydroxychloroquine and knowing they are useless, asked the army for millions of
chloroquine incapable against constant covid_numerica and the army lied that he had asked for it
